long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly invite suitable candidates on JobBank.gc.ca with just one click!

Introducing an extension designed specifically for employers using JobBank.gc.ca. Our tool streamlines the candidate invitation process by automating it, saving you time and effort. Instead of manually inviting candidates one by one, simply set a minimum score threshold and let the extension do the rest. With just one click, it will invite all eligible candidates who meet or exceed the specified threshold.

As the extension scripts this behavior, you'll see candidate pages cycle through your browser until the process is complete. Rest assured, we prioritize your privacy and security. This extension operates solely on your browser and neither collects nor transmits any data.

Enhance your JobBank.gc.ca experience and connect with the right candidates faster with our user-friendly and efficient extension!
